posts.post_title: FS: Lot of 6 T210 Old Mill Series 1 Cards
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T210 Old Mill Series 1 cards available for sale. These cards are all low to mid-grade as the scans will show.

Please add $4 shipping (USPS Ground Advantage which includes $100 insurance) for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Prices listed are net to me, via any payment method you prefer.

Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

CARDS PICTURED:

Eubank (Macon) - $45
Hartley (Columbus) - $55 (pinhole near corner) **SOLD**
Hille (Columbus) - $30 **SOLD**
Mulldowney (Columbia) - $45 (pinhole near corner) **SOLD**
Pelkey (Savannah) - $55 (pinhole near corner)
Raynolds (Columbia) - $45 **SOLD**
